column2:
"I'm up next. Good to have you helping me, \"comrade\".
Huh? No, I don't know why I call you that. When I look at your face, it just feels right."

"Let's see now, my wish...
My wish is to erase something so completely that it's like it was never there."

"But I haven't got the foggiest idea what that thing is...
Huh? You think you might? I knew I could count on you, comrade!"
"Well, guess I'll have to dump this one on you then. Do the best you can! It's all up to you, comrade!"
